About Page

Enjoy building your templating project!

Included in this generator ...

  • HTML5 template
  • normalize scss
  • sass(scss)
  • console js
  • modernizr
  • jQuery
  • JSON data
  • Handlebars partials
  • Gulp

To use livereload, ensure your browser has livereload enabled in settings.

Don't forget to run Gulp in the command line!
